General.Name: Markforged Holding Corp
General.Description: Markforged Holding Corporation produces and sells 3D printers, materials, software, and other related services worldwide. The company offers desktop 3D printers, industrial 3D printers, and metal 3D printers; composite, continuous fiber, and metal materials; and advanced 3D printing software products. It serves aerospace, military and defense, food and beverage, industrial automation, space exploration, healthcare, and automotive industries. Markforged Holding Corporation was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Waltham, Massachusetts.
General.Address: 60 Tower Road, Waltham, MA, United States, 02451
